datatypeProperties.comment: Does the standard include a policy for responsible sourcing of animal feed?
Does the standard include requirements on animal housing?
Does the standard require restrictions or prohibitions on the removal of animal body parts?
Does the standard require processes to be in place to ensure animal testing is necessary and humane?
General principle on livestock.Does the standard include a general principle on livestock?
Processes and document procedures in place for the appropriate administration of allowable medication to animals.Does the standard include criteria on medication?
Does the standard include criteria on animal breeding?
Does the standard include requirements for appropriate animal feeding?
Does the standard include general criteria on animal welfare?
Does the standard include requirements related to the use of litter and manure?
Does the standard include criteria on livestock density limits as defined in the EU Organic Farming Regulations?
Does the standard include other criteria related to live animals not addressed above
Does the standard require measures to support adequate outdoor access of livestock?
Does the standard require establishment and implementation of procedures to prevent the spread of animal disease?
Does the standard require procedures to be in place to ensure the consideration of animal welfare during slaughter?
Processes in place to ensure that the quality of animal feed meets the nutrients required for proper animal maintenance and production.Does the standard include criteria on quality of animal feed?
Does the standard include criteria on the use of organic feed?
Does the standard include requirements on the analysis of water quality in aquaculture?
Does the standard promote polyculture on fish farms?
Prophylactic use of antimicrobials are prohibited and used only in response to diagnosed disease.Does the standard prohibit the prophylactic use of antimicrobials?
Does the standard include requirements on minimizing the unintentional release or escape of farmed species?
Does the standard include criteria promoting the use of hatchery raised seed for fish farming?
Does the standard include requirements on the honey extraction process?
Does the standard include requirements on interior and exterior housing for beekeeping?
Does the standard include criteria on self-produced feed?
Does the standard include requirements on minimizing suffering during castration of live animals and/or live animal identification techniques?
Does the standard require restrictions on, or the prohibition of, the use of electric prods when handling live animals?
Does the standard include criteria on the welfare of animals during transport?
